short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run custom prompts on text in the browser. Create your AI helper for grammar fixes, summaries, and translations with an OpenAI key

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can use your own OpenAI (ChatGPT) API key and create custom prompt cards. Run these prompts on any selected text on a web page to instantly get results within the extension.

Select text → Open Prompt Selected → Choose your prompt → Get result

It can be used for the following use cases:

 • Grammar fixes
 • Article summarization
 • Explain-like-I'm-5 action
 • Translation from any language to any language
 • Quick Tweet creation
 • <any other scenario you can think of>

Features:
 • Unlimited number of custom prompts
 • Sleek onboarding
 • Prebuilt prompt examples
 • Supports gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, and gpt-3.5-turbo models
 • History of prompts with inputs and results
 • No tracking, no data leaks

Stop paying for multiple AI tools that each do only one thing; take control of your spending with Prompt Selected.

*Security & Privacy*
The extension doesn't send any data to any third-party websites; it only communicates with the OpenAI platform. We don't share your key; it is stored locally on your computer. If you're familiar with Chrome DevTools, you can verify that the service worker only calls OpenAI.
